thread.title: These Comics Show What It Looks Like When Two Weirdos Fall In Love
thread.title_full: These Comics Show What It Looks Like When Two Weirdos Fall In Love

author: Kelsey Borresen
title: These Comics Show What It Looks Like When Two Weirdos Fall In Love
text:
These Comics Show What It Looks Like When Two Weirdos Fall In Love True love can be wonderful ‚Äï and really weird too. ü§ì 02/09/2017 07:17 pm ET | Updated 0 minutes ago Kelsey Borresen Relationships Editor, The Huffington Post 
When two weirdos fall in love , every day is a hilarious adventure. 
Artist Sarah Graley , based in Birmingham, U.K., captures this perfectly in her ‚ÄúOur Super Adventure ‚Äù comics ‚Äï a series based on her relationship with Stef, her sweet and sometimes sassy boyfriend of six years. Our Super Adventure 
The comics show the couple‚Äôs funny banter, their love for their four cats Pesto, Toby, Wilson and Pixel, and of course, their love for each other. 
‚ÄúStef‚Äôs this whole other human being but it totally feels like we‚Äôre just one person!‚Äù she told HuffPost. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs so comforting to have someone you can talk to about anything, and he‚Äôs always helping me with my comics. I feel like we‚Äôre this tight little unit and it‚Äôs exciting to be this team together! I feel like we can take on anything.‚Äù
